long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you love motorsport, the 2025 Motorsport Countdown extension is the one for you.

It's a live calendar of the bigges races coming up next on the calendar, from Formula 1 and MotoGP to WEC, WRC, Indycar and Formula E - and more planned for coming updates.

• REPLAY highlights from last year's races!

• CATCH UP on the latest news headlines!

• PLAN AHEAD with each championship's calendar!

• CHECK THE STANDINGS with one click!

• PLAY the mega-popular daily F1 STEWARDLE game!

• LINK AND WATCH your favourite streaming services with one click!

Got an idea for an improvement? Send an email through to the developer below - I'm always eager for feedback. 

Note: Extension window may take a few seconds to load the first time it's run, but should be instant for later loads.
